description.en:
The NIT or Identify Tax Number is the number assigned by the Tax Administration to a natural person, a legal entity at the time of registration for any economic activity, by virtue of which they are taxable persons of some of the taxes established by Law.
https://impuestos.com.bo/rnd-03-13/

access.guidanceOnLocatingIds: There are yearly lists of named providers (nomina de proveedores) at the following URL https://www.senapi.gob.bo/contrataciones/nomina-de-proveedores. Open a PDF link and you may find identifiers using the NIT column.
